description:
Due to certain circumstances, ordinary high school student Misumi Makoto is summoned to another world to become a Hero... at least, he was supposed to be one. However, despised by the Goddess for a ridiculous reason, Makoto is banished to the barren Wasteland. At his wit`s end, Makoto wanders the wasteland, where he begins to make friends with Highland orc girl Emma. However, when Makoto learns that she`s going to be sacrificed to the greater dragon Shen...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Première nuit du héros... ou pas
